title: iBaba
author: iBaba
content: Hi mates, hope say una dey fine. Who else have noticed the new User Interface of Binance app on both iOS and Android devices?New Binance interfaceSourceWetin you like about this new looks?

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Yes me too experienced am from my app but you can always change it from Lite to pro, or from Pro to Lite it depends on the one you like to dey use. Usually me dey more familiarized with pro instead of lite because everything just dey congested inside one place than the pro if you wan change am just click on your circled image at the top right hand side then tap am more things go show just look down below "reward Hub, pay, security, notifications" the next is Binance pro click on it you would change it to lite or decides to change it back Pro. They Pro dey more friendly and if i dey use p2p i dey easily dey find out how the things be but lite to dey worry me small all less say i no dey in haste to sell my bitcoin.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: I notice am today with my android phone when I try to do small trade today, I no lie u eh been confuse me cuz most menu them way been they appear for the front page I no see am again especially for the convert and the P2P part I close my Binance open am like twice I even refresh am tire thinking say nah network Wahala. Nah when I come go the wallet part I come use the convert option carry convert Watin I wan then I waka jejely go my p2p go do my thing waka comot. But the thing confuse meooo, I come even they think say my account don get some kind restriction, way I no no Watin I don comit way go make them restrict am, be cuz I been also view the one way they my IOS nothing change, as nah two different account, but as I succeed do Watin I been wan do I come notice say nah just small change.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: I just noticed it too because it has been a while I use Binance Exchange.This particular interface you showed is for Binance Lite which you can change to Binance pro in the Binance exchange app.This new interface is good even though I didnâ€™t see so many changes. But it beautifies the exchange home page more than it used to be, but I prefer using Binance pro because of some features which include:DiscoveriesNewsAcademy Live.These features is good for the exchange users as they will be updated about all the current news related to the exchange and the cryptocurrency in general, which makes the exchange more user friendly.
